message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start.
Your cut decreases each round with inflation. Let's be reasonable, 55/45 split.
I can still get a bit more than 55%, 58-42 is my new offer.
This is getting ridiculous. Take the deal at 52/48 before inflation hurts you more.
Inflation or not, I still think I deserve more. 57-43 is my new offer.
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair option.  Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
